section.title: Description
section.p: The health condition(s) associated with the policy. Conditions when specified, are coded concepts expressed in a standard vocabulary (e.g., LOINC, SNOMED CT, etc.). These may include indications of 'substance abuse' or 'HIV-related' illnesses, etc. An obligationCode may be implemented as a 'condition'.
